titleStmt.title: The pleasant conceits of Old Hobson the merry Londoner Full of humorous discourses, and witt[y] merryments, whereat the quickest wits may laugh, and the wiser sort take pleasure.
titleStmt.author: Johnson, Richard, 1573-1659?

publicationStmt.publisher: for William Gilbertson dwelling .. Gilt-spur-street at the signe of the Bible,
